## Imports
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
h2o::h2o.no_progress()
devtools::load_all()
```

## Script parameters
```{r}
database <- "test_signauxfaibles"
collection <- "Features"
actual_period <- as.Date("2019-03-01")
periods <- actual_period
last_batch <- "1904"
min_effectif <- 10
retrain_model <- TRUE
type <- "dataframe"
```

```{r}
connect_to_h2o()
```

```{r}
res <- full_light_gradient_boosting(
  database,
  collection,
  periods,
  last_batch,
  min_effectif,
  retrain_model = retrain_model,
  type = type
  )
```
